string.name: instructions_info
string.Data:
The first step to using Jarble is to choose two target behaviors.
For example: following directions and marking good choices.

Once the target behaviors are entered into the app, notes can be made about the chosen behaviors per interval.

Each jar has ten marbles and in order to earn a reward at the end of two hours, eight marbles must be filled in.

The intervals will run on two hour time periods and can be started at any time.

The app will set a timer for you once you start an interval for the check-in periods.
The check-in timer will alert you every thirty minutes and at this time you will discuss how many marbles were earned (at each check-in two marbles can be earned).

Rewards should be a pre-determined list and can only be available through achieving the required eight marbles.
Rewards that are available anytime may possibly be less effective when using this token system.
